title: Pokémon Explorer
intro: Fast, searchable Pokédex with evolutions, shiny toggles, and a random team generator.
problem: Let users find any Pokémon instantly and explore evolutions/shiny forms without slow page hops.
solution: Instant search with debounced queries; renders details as you type.
Evolution traversal with previous/next and tree-hop navigation.
Per-Pokémon shiny toggle plus a mass shiny mode for the current view.
Random team generator (6 per click) with one-tap refresh.
Quality-of-life: sticky back-to-top, keyboard navigation, and focus rings.
results: Sub-100 ms perceived search after debounce on typical connections.
Clear evolution traversal reduces page churn and confusion.
Random team flow increases engagement time.
